ygData.subject: Re: Thermal Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: I found a rawhide cloak in kithicor forest in a shop near the west end of the zone. I did not have the money to buy one, so I do not know if they were sold by
ygData.messageBody:
I found a rawhide cloak in kithicor forest in a shop near the west end of
the zone. I did not have the money to buy one, so I do not know if they were
sold by a player, or always offered by the merchant. If they were sold by a
player, then they probably come from the orcs near there.


> Message: 2
> Date: Mon, 12 Jul 1999 15:19:42 -0400
> From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
> Subject: Thermal Cloak
>
> Which quest gives out the tattered cloak as a reward? I heard the newbie
> gnome warrior Red V provides them sometimes (unfortunately I got rawhide
> shoulderpads when I did it). Then I heard of a felwithe quest. Anyone
> know for sure?
